attributes.action: encourage the use of public transport permit/instruct local councils to provide free bus passes to all residents and to fund this by an increase in council tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would encourage people to use public transport by in effect making the actual journeys free. Those that continued to use their cars for local journeys would subsidise those who did not but would still allow freedom of choice..
